text:
Hi,

Have an issue with the new release of Apache 2.0.39 and PHP 4.2.1 in Windows.  
I was running everything fine with 2.0.36 but now that I try and load the 
php4apache2.dll module the server will just not start no matter and the 
requested operation fails.

i.e. LoadModule php4_module "I:/php/sapi/php4apache2.dll" does not work

If i take the load module entry out it works.  This is not good as cannot run 
PHP pages in new Apache version....is this Apache or PHP issue.
creator: michael.haslam@btinternet.com

text: problem with PHP version - latest 4.3.0dev version works ok.
creator: michael.haslam@btinternet.com
